DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionPositions
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of positions in sequentially increasing order paired with _CrossSections_, indicating the position of the corresponding section along the _Directrix_.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSections
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of cross sections in sequential order along the Directrix

DocWhereRule.Name: DirectrixIs3D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The curve entity which is the underlying directrix shall have the dimensionality of 3.

DocWhereRule.Name: AreaProfileTypes
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The profile type shall be CURVE within the list of the profiles defining the cross sections.

DocWhereRule.Name: SectionsSameType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The entity type for each section must be the same.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingSectionPositions
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The set of cross sections and the set of cross section placements shall be of the same size.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoOffsets
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Distance expressions must not use longitudinal, laterial or vertical offsets.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* CrossSectionPositions | EXISTS(temp.Location.OffsetLateral) OR EXISTS(temp.Location.OffsetVertical) OR EXISTS(temp.Location.OffsetLongitudinal))) = 0
